reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Could improve on office hours availability.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Makes complex topics easy to understand and always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes rushes through material. More practice exercises would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Rodriguez is patient and explains concepts well.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Best professor I've had! Engaging labs and relates topics to real-world applications.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and monotonous. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Lee is passionate about the subject and it shows.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions but heavy workload. More feedback on essays would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Eye-opening course. Dr. Garcia encourages critical thinking and class participation.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear lecturer and fair grader. Sometimes goes off-topic but overall a good professor.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips to museums were a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting material but lectures can be disorganized. More structure would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging professor with a focus on current environmental issues. Group projects were challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and well-structured arguments. Prof. White is always open to different perspectives.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating subject matter. Dr. Cohen makes language analysis accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Outdated teaching methods and little real-world application. Needs to update the curriculum.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! Explains complex concepts clearly and provides excellent research opportunities.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but strict. Grading can be harsh, but you'll learn a lot if you put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer with a wealth of fieldwork experience. Course could benefit from more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher who goes above and beyond to help students succeed. Challenging but rewarding course.
